name: PalliativeCareEncounter
title: Palliative Care Encounter
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent identifying patients receiving palliative, comfort or hospice care.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Encounter.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with identifying patients receiving palliative, comfort or hospice care.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
